str2: To crack off, burst out in rage
LORD -- the proper name of the God of Israel

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Taberah -- 'burning', a place in the desert

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Massah -- a place in the desert where Israelites rebelled

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Kibroth-hattaavah -- 'the graves of desire', a place in the desert
